title: Ep. 753 The Real Story Behind the Witch Hunt
description:
Summary:
In this episode I address another bizarre twist in the Mueller probe that has escaped wide media scrutiny. I also address the troubling actions of Rod Rosenstein and the reasons that some blue states are celebrating Donald Trump. 
 
News Picks:
Here’s another bizarre twist in the Mueller probe. 
 
Here’s what is really at stake with this Supreme Court vacancy. 
 
The economy is motoring along. 
 
Mueller’s investigation isn’t as strong as we’ve been lead to believe. 
 
Why was this Democrat-connected lobbyist visiting Julian Assange? 
 
Is Twitter responding to conservatives? 
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
